title: 040 Sending events back to an activity with callback interface
If you need to send events from fragment to activity, one of the possible solutions is to define callback interface and require that the host activity implement it.

inline_content.Text: If you need to send events from fragment to activity, one of the possible solutions is to define callback interface and require that the host activity implement it.
